snippet.title: Wishlist Aurascope on Steam! 2023 Sizzle Reel
snippet.description:
That's right, Aurascope now has a Steam page so be sure to wishlist the game so to help drum up support! This was a little teaser reel of just some of the content that's coming to the next v0.2.0 demo of Aurascope. I just wanted to tease a few aspects and when the time is right I'll drop a full fledged trailer with everything coming to the next demo! Thank you to everyone for the constant support and I'm so happy that Aurascope is making waves!

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1547880/Aurascope/

Check the website: https://aurascope.net
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/invite/fcUf8pD
Follow our Twitter: https://twitter.com/AurascopeGame
